Description: Magical gem; intaglio; red jasper; oval; engraved on obverse: scene of Hercules strangling the Nemean lion; club to right of Hercules; inscribed on reverse.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (391)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs
Associated events: Associated Event: Hercules and the Nemean Lion
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G224 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9710 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
